creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: top rectangle has black 2" band; embroidered section has two squares framed by embroidered vine-like pattern in chain stitch; squares have floral center; free-hanging padded medallion has four red tassels with beads and one brass bell; bottom rectangle has black border on three sides; center has elaborate Chinese design in red, purple, green; black lining
title: Baby Carrier
